pr_title: core: On unexpected EOS, mention whether the frame was empty

timeline.message:
core: On unexpected EOS, mention whether the frame was empty

Empty DATA frames with EOS tell a stronger tale as to where the server
may have its bug.

timeline.bodyText: The return value of readableBytes() may depend on the current read index, and inboundDataReceived(frame) may have changed the read index?
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Fixed. This problem would have impacted #7277 as well.
replies.author: ejona86
